channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Welcome to the ‘skills mismatch economy’: the shift from roles to skills making your resume—and your job title—meaningless

item.title: Consumer Prices Rose 2.8 Percent Through November 2025, a Sign of Sticky Inflation
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge for inflation in October and November was released belatedly after the government shutdown.

item.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
item.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

item.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
item.description: CEOs reveal how AI, social media and bold leadership are shaping the future of business.

item.title: Trump’s Rift With Europe Is Clear. Europe Must Decide What to Do About It.
item.description: After President Trump aired his disdain for Europe, its leaders will gather in Brussels Thursday to take stock of what comes next.
